attributes.action: End travel restrictions for loved ones. Help bring families/love ones together
attributes.additional_details: Drop the traffic light system and allow partners,  love ones and family to apply for visa a travel to the UK if they have been double vaccinated. The pandemic has been hard for everyone imagine the pain if someone you care about being halfway round the world the mental pressure could be eased and a lot of happiness could be granted if you adopt the same visa policies as the E.U did and most E.U countries have lower infection rate then UK international travel doesn't effect covid infections.
attributes.background:
The E.U has a partner or family visa, so anyone that's double jabbed with a approved vaccine can visit and be with loved ones . I want a end to the traffic light system for people that have been separated during the pandemic. Help bring loved ones together again. 
love isn't tourism.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want new visas to allow travel for families and partners or an end to testing and isolation rules for families and partners visiting the UK. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
